name: part_014
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs a cover of 'Anata ga Iru Koto de' by Uru.

subtitles.original:
あなたがいることで
歌：沙花叉クロヱ
作詞・作曲：Uru
subtitles.english:
Anata ga Iru Koto de
Vocal: Sakamata Chloe
Lyrics/Composition: Uru

subtitles.original: どんな言葉で
subtitles.english: With what words

subtitles.original: 今あなたに伝えられるだろう
subtitles.english: could I convey it to you now?

subtitles.original: 不器用な僕だけど
subtitles.english: I'm clumsy, but

subtitles.original: ちゃんとあなたに届くように
subtitles.english: I hope this properly reaches you.

subtitles.original: 明日が見えなくなって
subtitles.english: When I can't see tomorrow,

subtitles.original: 信じることが怖くなって
subtitles.english: and I become afraid of believing,

subtitles.original: 過去を悔やんでは責めたりもしたけれど
subtitles.english: I regretted the past and even blamed myself, but...

subtitles.original: 僕を愛し続けて
subtitles.english: The person who continued

subtitles.original: くれた人
subtitles.english: to love me.

subtitles.original: もしも世界が終わっても
subtitles.english: Even if the world ends,

subtitles.original: 会えない日々が続いたとしても
subtitles.english: even if the days we can't meet continue,

subtitles.original: 僕はずっとあなたを想うよ
subtitles.english: I will always be thinking of you.

subtitles.original: あの日僕にくれたあなたの笑顔が
subtitles.english: The smile you gave me that day

subtitles.original: 生きる力と勇気をくれたんだ
subtitles.english: gave me the strength and courage to live.

subtitles.original: 星が見えない孤独な夜でも
subtitles.english: Even on lonely nights when no stars can be seen,

subtitles.original: あなたがいる　ただそれだけで強くなれる
subtitles.english: you are there, and just for that, I can become strong.

subtitles.original: 目が合えば笑って
subtitles.english: When our eyes meet, you smile,

subtitles.original: 一緒にいれば楽しくて
subtitles.english: being together is fun.

subtitles.original: 共に過ごした毎日は
subtitles.english: The days we spent together

subtitles.original: かけがえのないものだった
subtitles.english: were irreplaceable.

subtitles.original: 向かい風が冷たくて
subtitles.english: The headwind is cold,

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまいそうになるけど
subtitles.english: and I almost forget, but...

subtitles.original: 通り過ぎてきた何気ない日々の中に
subtitles.english: Within the casual days that have passed,

subtitles.original: 僕らの幸せは確かにあった
subtitles.english: our happiness was certainly there.

subtitles.original: もしも負けそうな夜の中で
subtitles.english: If in a night when I feel like giving in,

subtitles.original: 一人静かに泣いているのなら
subtitles.english: you are crying alone in silence,

subtitles.original: あなたが僕を信じてくれたように
subtitles.english: just as you believed in me,

subtitles.original: 次は僕がその手を強く握るから
subtitles.english: next time, I will grip that hand of yours tightly.

subtitles.original: 傷つくことから逃げていた
subtitles.english: I was running away from being hurt.

subtitles.original: この心動かすのは
subtitles.english: What moves this heart

subtitles.original: 弱さを見せないあなたが見せてくれた
subtitles.english: is what you, who doesn't show weakness, showed me...

subtitles.original: 初めて見せた涙
subtitles.english: the tears you showed for the first time.

subtitles.original: いつか僕に話してくれた
subtitles.english: One day you told me,

subtitles.original: あなたが描いた未来の中に
subtitles.english: within the future you envisioned,

subtitles.original: 僕ら一緒にいられるように
subtitles.english: so that we can be together.

subtitles.original: あなたがいることで
subtitles.english: By you being there,

subtitles.original: どんな明日も歩いていける光になるから
subtitles.english: you become the light that allows me to walk into any tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 星が見えない孤独な夜でも
subtitles.english: Even on lonely nights when no stars can be seen,

subtitles.original: 信じられる　僕らならここで笑える日を
subtitles.english: I can believe, that for us, the day we can smile here will come.
